column4: I have a new hp z800, I installed ubuntu 10.04.1 and is not able to display anything or is displaying (where the login screen should probably be) a distorted thing
as mentioned you need to keep to one line or else it is impossible to read and understand what's up. If you are having issues with your graphics perhaps it will help to boot in safe graphics mode.
oh, I thought you were on the live-cd.  That is odd, but no unheard of.

I think the live-cd boots in a safer mode as the installer will try to check for more devices or something like that. the installer probably screws something up and booting in safe gfx mode might get your drivers installed properly.
